Title: MTGenome
Description:
MTGenome is a card database system for Magic: the Gathering collectable card game.

Eventually features like online play, drafting, etc. will be added.
HomeWiki:
MTGenome

MTGenome is a full featured card database software package for the Magic: the Gathering card game.

The goal is to create a free, open source replacement for outdated software such as "Apprentice" or "Magic Workstation".

Want to help? Please contact me! Especially need a graphic artist for icon sets, theming, etc.

WE ARE IN NEED OF A GRAPHIC DESIGNER! Check out the project openings.

Developers

MTGenome is built with C#, .Net 4.0, and uses SQLServerCe as its backend database storage.

MTGenome was an experiment in software design using MVVM, IoC, & DI. Now uses Caliburn for MVVM framework. Code critiques welcome.

Upcoming
  • Extended filtering and searching, searching will be able to be as complicated (or more) than what you get on gatherer
  • Playmat - for solitaire games or laptop vs real cards
  • Peer-to-Peer Online play, chat, etc. using no central servers at all
